A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Filled with unnecessary plot twists and bad acting Rian Johnson fumbles the star wars trilogy. Mark Hamill was right in saying this is a different Luke. Its the worst depiction of Luke from any series. Luke has reverted to the  whiny brat from a new hope\, maybe even younger. Also the constant mention of hope was a strong push to tie this in the 1977-83 trilogy. The acting is bad and its not the actors; its the director/writer. Star wars gave us a canvas of a far away place. With the dialogue such as Fin taunting Phasma puts this in the present:2017. Thank you\, Rian.
